name: cms138v14_preventive_care_and_screening_tobacco_use_screening_and_cessation_intervention
description: CMS138v14 - Preventive Care and Screening: Tobacco Use Screening and Cessation Intervention. Tracks tobacco use screening for patients 12+ and cessation interventions for identified tobacco users.

protocols.description: CMS138v14 Clinical Quality Measure - Percentage of patients aged 12 years and older who were screened for tobacco use one or more times during the measurement period AND who received tobacco cessation intervention if identified as a tobacco user.

meta.title: Preventive Care and Screening: Tobacco Use: Screening and Cessation Intervention
meta.description: Percentage of patients aged 12 years and older who were screened for tobacco use and who received tobacco cessation intervention if identified as a tobacco user.
